long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension acts as a notifier for when new listings appear on popular Slovenian stores. 

When new listing appears you get a notification badge in top right corner and when clicking it you get a short description of item with image and price. Clicking one of items takes you directly to store listing. 

User can use stores search page to filter out wanted results and then set that url as search query in extension settings.

Supported stores: bolha.com, nepremicnine.net, avto.net
